amendment.description: Amendment sought to require a review of available and new, innovative technologies for capturing municipal wastewater and recycling it for providing drinking water and energy, and a report on the feasibility of expanding the implementation of these technologies and programs among Central Valley Project contractors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 115-212 to require a review of available and new, innovative technologies for capturing municipal wastewater and recycling it for providing drinking water and energy, and a report on the feasibility of expanding the implementation of these technologies and programs among Central Valley Project contractors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 221 (Roll no. 350).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 221 (Roll no. 350).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
